text: If i could post 0 stars I would have. Delivery is always and i say ALWAYS late. I've had nothing but bad experiences out of this location. They can't even handle scheduling a pick up. The only papa ginos that's always 3 hour wait. …More

name: Ashish Singhvi
text: Great pizza! Not sure why all the bad reviews. Definitely recommend.

name: Randall Stevens
text: Have had a couple of bad experiences with customer service at this location in the past. Had business next door so decided to give it one more try. Mistake. Went in Friday a little past 4:00 to get a quick sub to go. Stood at the counter …More

name: Ervin Johnson
text: Every time I find myself in the area I stop here. The pizza isn't too greas like most pizza shops (except the pepperoni). The subs are always delicious (turkey club, chicken cutlet, or steak and cheese) and I never expect "fast food speed" from a non fast food restaurant.

name: Alec LaFond
text: Just had my pizza delivered. It was ICE cold and HARD as a rock. I've never been this disappointed in a pizza

text: Worst papa ginos ive ever been to. Ordered online. Order wasnt started until after i was supposed to pick it up. Pizza was not good. Poorly made. Ordered an extra large and a small. Got a large and the smallest small pizza ive ever seen.

name: Earl Alexander
text: Poor service....forgetful staff.  Slow delivery.  Ordered a pizza at 6:30pm and still waiting at 8:52pm.  Order placed incorrectly then never delivered.  Will not order from them again.   Horrible service!!

text: Rustic pizza is tasty, salad is subpar but friendly service

text: I tried to put in an order online.  I tried 5 times.  I called the store and they claimed it was a website issue that they had nothing to do with.  I changed to a different location and the order was accepted first try.
